fno: In the cash market, the Nifty 50 advanced 111 points or 0.61% to settle at 18,314.40. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, advanced 2.17% to 12.57. Adani Enterprises, Adani Ports and Special Economic Zone and HDFC Bank were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The May 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 25 May 2023.
